highlights: Built data gateway for  myDATA conversational AI tool in Node.js/Fastify, Prisma, Postgres and typescript. Integrated data sources such as Google analytics, Snowflake, Linkedin and JSON/XLSX/CSV. Wrote unit/integration tests and built CI/CD pipeline with Github actions, deployed to Digital Ocean Kubernetes cluster.
Wrote documentation for PowerdbyAI and myDATA data gateway with Redocusaurus and OpenAPI specs.
Improved core NLP engine of myDATA conversational AI tool using bayesian methods.

Built PowerdbyAI, a low code machine learning platform for developers  now in private beta. using Node/Express, typescript, prisma, mongodb and react.  Wrote unit & integration tests , built CI/CD pipeline with Github actions and deployed to Digital Ocean app platform.
Built company's website as a static export with React.js

Built Cobble app in react native and Typescript, downloaded by 5000+ users.  Wrote integration tests in Jest and  built CI/CD pipeline in Github actions for deployment to Firebase, App Platform and Playstore.

Built API for Cobble app in Node.js/Express, Typescript, Prisma and Mongo DB, integrated payments with Paystack, Mono and Okra and credit data fetching and submission to two out of three Credit Bureaus in Nigeria (First Central and CRC).  Built CI/CD pipeline with Github actions, deployed to Digital Ocean droplets.
Wrote documentation with Swagger and OpenAPI specs.
Taught fundamental linear algebra, calculus, basic combinatorics and basic tools for data analysis/visualization
Taught basic programming course  in secondary schools with Python

projects.name: Local Foods
projects.description: Fullstack app to find and book tables at restaurants near you using next.js , mapbox, mongo db and stripe, db seeded with zomato data from kaggle.

projects.name: Price Action
projects.description: Search and visualize price action of crypto tokens with coin gecko API, Next.js and plotly.js

projects.name: MovieDb
projects.description: MovieDB clone - Discover movies, tv, shows and actors with Next.js and MovieDB API

projects.name: Remote Jobs
projects.description: Post and find remote jobs. Remoteok.io clone built with mongo db, next.js and stripe, with infinity scroll
